aka: Contes modernes: Au sujet de l'enfance
Contes modernes: À propos du travail

cast.name: 帕特里克·薛内斯 Patrick Chesnais
帕斯卡勒·奥德雷 Pascale Audret
米歇尔·德拉海耶 Michel Delahaye
Bertrand Van Effenterre Bertrand Van Effenterre

writer.name: 安德烈·S·拉巴尔特 André S. Labarthe

trans_title: Contes modernes: Au sujet de l'enfance
Contes modernes: À propos du travail
introduction: So simple and terrific in the same time. The story of a fifty years old man searching for a job, as millions of other people like him. It is simple, but horrible and terrifying if you watch it closely, if you think about it long enough after watching this short film. Imagine that the letter he writes after meeting one of the managers , this letter is deeply analyzed by a graphologist. This person will know, only by studying the hand writing, if the man searching for a job is competent or not. This short tale emphasizes on the absurdity of the system. It is rough, incredible and very discouraging at the most if you search yourself for a job.
